title: French Revolution
key_facts: Period of radical social and political change in France
Began with the Estates-General and the storming of the Bastille
Ended with the rise of Napoleon Bonaparte
outcome: Establishment of the Consulate under Napoleon Bonaparte in 1799.

figures.name: Maximilien Robespierre
figures.role: Leader during the Reign of Terror

figures.name: Napoleon Bonaparte
figures.role: Military leader who rose to power

impacts: Abolition of feudal privileges and spread of republican ideals
Inspiration for future revolutions and political reforms
Codification of rights influencing modern constitutions
